name: BiomeSwitch
description:
During a fluid simulation, a drop of water becomes sentient. Save Dropie from various hazards in a broken simulation generating biomes in an endless loop.

Made in 3 days for MiniJam97.

Controls

A & D to move

R to reset

SPACE to jump

Credits

Developer Andrew Hong [ GitHub Twitter Itch.io ]

Artist Arix [ Itch.io ]

Sound Designer/Composer Cyber Squib [ Blog SoundCloud ]
